data.title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival: Save Up To 60% On Kurtas From BIBA
data.meta_description: The Amazon Great Freedom Festival is back, offering incredible discounts of up to 60% on BIBA's finest kurtas and ethnic sets. This is the perfect opportunity to revamp your wardrobe with stylish and traditional attire without breaking the bank.
data.text:
The Amazon Great Freedom Festival is an exciting time for fashion enthusiasts, particularly for those seeking traditional yet stylish attire. BIBA, a leading name in ethnic wear, presents an exceptional collection of kurtas at amazing discounts. This is an ideal opportunity to refresh your wardrobe with exquisite pieces that blend comfort and elegance. From casual outings to festive occasions, BIBA kurtas provide versatile options for every woman. Let's explore the standout selections available during this sale and discover what makes each piece a must-have for your wardrobe.

Top 15 Amazon Deals On Ethnic Wear From BIBA At Up To 60%

1. BIBA Women Grey Cotton Straight Printed Kurta

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹499 | M.R.P.: ₹999 | Rating: 3.6 out of 5 stars

This grey cotton straight kurta from BIBA is a blend of comfort and style. Featuring a mandarin neck and floral pattern, it is perfect for both casual and formal occasions. The knee-length design and 3/4 sleeves add to its elegance.

Key Features:

Material: Cotton

Sleeve type: 3/4 Sleeve

Length: Knee Length

Neck style: Mandarin Neck

Pattern: Floral

Style: Regular

2. BIBA Women Cotton Solid Straight Kurta

Discount: 53% | Price: ₹610 | M.R.P.: ₹1,299 | Rating: 3.8 out of 5 stars

This red cotton straight kurta is a vibrant addition to your wardrobe. Its collared neck and solid pattern provide a sleek look, while the regular fit ensures comfort throughout the day.

Key Features:

Size: M

Fit: Regular

Washcare: Machine Wash

Colour: Red

Material: Cotton

3. BIBA Women Printed Straight Salwar Kurta Dupatta

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹1,299 | M.R.P.: ₹2,599 | Rating: 3.5 out of 5 stars

This printed straight salwar kurta set in yellow is a must-have for festive occasions. The rayon fabric offers a soft touch, and the set includes a straight palazzo and a dupatta, completing the ethnic look.

Key Features:

Colour: Yellow

Fit: Asymmetric

Pattern: Printed

Fabric: Rayon

Components: Kurta, Straight Palazzo, Dupatta

4. BIBA SKD Salwar Suit Set

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹2,249 | M.R.P.: ₹4,500 | Rating: 3.6 out of 5 stars

This red salwar suit set is perfect for traditional gatherings. Made from cotton, it features a full-sleeve band neck kurta and calf-length design, ensuring you look graceful and comfortable.

Key Features:

Colour: Red

Length: Calf Length

Sleeve type: Full Sleeve

Neck style: Band Neck

Material: Cotton

5. BIBA Women Cotton Printed Narrow Salwar Kurta Dupatta

Discount: 63% | Price: ₹1,479 | M.R.P.: ₹3,999 | Rating: 3.8 out of 5 stars

This fuchsia-printed narrow salwar kurta set is an eye-catching outfit. The set includes a slim pant and a poly chanderi dupatta, making it perfect for festive and casual wear.

Key Features:

Colour: Fuchsia

Fabric of Kurta: Cotton

Fabric of Bottom: Satin

Fabric of Dupatta: Poly Chanderi

Pattern: Printed

Components: Kurta, Slim Pant, Dupatta

6. BIBA Women Cotton Regular Kurta

Discount: 62% | Price: ₹607 | M.R.P.: ₹1,599 | Rating: 3.9 out of 5 stars

This yellow regular kurta made from cotton is ideal for daily wear. The straight fit and printed pattern add a touch of elegance, while the 3/4 sleeve and round neck provide comfort.

Key Features:

Colour: Yellow

Sleeve Type: 3/4th Sleeve

Fit: Straight

Fabric Of Kurta: Cotton

Pattern: Printed

7. BIBA Women Cotton Regular Kurti

Discount: 40% | Price: ₹1,199 | M.R.P.: ₹1,999 | Rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars

This blue regular kurta is perfect for any occasion. Made from cotton, it features an ankle-length design and a solid pattern, making it a versatile addition to your ethnic collection.

Key Features:

Colour: Blue

Pattern: Printed

Fabric: Cotton

Fit: Straight

Components: Kurti

8. BIBA Women Cotton Regular Kurta

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹1,649 | M.R.P.: ₹2,999 | Rating: 3.8 out of 5 stars

This elegant kurta in a beautiful blue shade is crafted from cotton, offering comfort and style. The 3/4 sleeve and round neck design ensure a perfect fit for any casual or semi-formal event.

Key Features:

Colour: Blue

Pattern: Printed

Fabric: Cotton

Fit: Regular

Length: Calf Length

Sleeve Type: 3/4 Sleeve

9. BIBA Women Cambric Kalidar Printed Kurta Palazzo Suit Set

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹1,999 | M.R.P.: ₹3,999 | Rating: 3.3 out of 5 stars

This kurta palazzo suit set features a beautiful white cambric fabric with intricate prints, offering both comfort and style. The long sleeves and round neck design add to its elegance, making it perfect for various occasions.

Key Features:

Fabric: Cotton Blend

Fit: Kalidar

Sleeve Type: Long Sleeves

Neck Style: Round Neck

10. BIBA Women's Moss Green Straight Rayon Printed Kurta Palazzo Set

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹1,299 | M.R.P.: ₹2,599 | Rating: 4.2 out of 5 stars

This moss green kurta palazzo set is made from soft rayon fabric, providing a comfortable fit. The elbow-length sleeves and round neck design make it a versatile choice for casual and semi-formal occasions.

Key Features:

Fabric: Rayon

Sleeve Type: Elbow Length

Neck Style: Round Neck

Care Instructions: Hand Wash Only

11. BIBA Women Cotton Printed Narrow Salwar Kurta Dupatta

Discount: 53% | Price: ₹1,781.70 | M.R.P.: ₹3,799 | Rating: 3.3 out of 5 stars

Featuring a sea green colour and full-length design, this cotton kurta with narrow salwar and dupatta is ideal for festive occasions. The printed pattern and straight fit add a touch of sophistication.

Key Features:

Fabric: Cotton

Fit: Straight

Included Components: Kurta, Regular Pants, Dupatta

Sleeve Type: Long Sleeves

12. BIBA Women Cream Cotton Straight Printed Kurta

Discount: 48% | Price: ₹519 | M.R.P.: ₹999 | Rating: 3.7 out of 5 stars

This cream-coloured cotton kurta is perfect for everyday wear. The knee-length design, 3/4 sleeves, and mandarin neck provide a chic look, while the printed pattern adds a touch of elegance.

Key Features:

Fabric: Cotton

Sleeve Type: 3/4 Sleeve

Length: Knee Length

Neck Style: Mandarin Neck

13. BIBA Women Coral Art Silk Flared Printed Short Kurti

Discount: 52% | Price: ₹969 | M.R.P.: ₹1,999 | Rating: 3.9 out of 5 stars

Made from luxurious art silk, this coral-coloured kurti features a flared design with 3/4 sleeves and a collar neck. It's a perfect choice for festive gatherings and special occasions.

Key Features:

Fabric: 100% Polyester

Sleeve Type: 3/4 Sleeve

Length: Waist Length

Neck Style: Collar Neck

14. BIBA Women Cotton Suit Set

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹2,000 | M.R.P.: ₹3,999 | Rating: 3.9 out of 5 stars

This elegant cotton suit set in green features a full-length kurta with long sleeves and a V-neck. The set includes regular pants and a dupatta, making it a complete outfit for any occasion.

Key Features:

Fabric: Cotton

Fit: Kalidar

Pattern: Solid

Included Components: Kurta, Regular Pants, Dupatta

15. BIBA Solid Rayon Straight Fit Women Kurta

Discount: 50% | Price: ₹1,000 | M.R.P.: ₹1,999 | Rating: 3.7 out of 5 stars

This solid rayon kurta is a versatile addition to your wardrobe. The straight fit, calf-length design, and V-neck make it suitable for both casual and formal wear.

Key Features:

Fabric: 100% Rayon

Sleeve Type: 3/4 Sleeve

Length: Calf Length

Neck Style: V-Neck
